subtitle: A mid-week treat and a good way of using up mashed potato and breadcrumbs.

method.text: Mix together the pilchards and sauce, potatoes, onion, lemon juice and season to taste. Shape into 8 (2 per person) round flat cakes with floured hands. Dip in beaten egg, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry fish cakes for 5-6 min or until golden brown. Drain on crumpled up kitchen paper. Serve piping hot.

title: Pilchard fish cakes
